title: Extreme bug abuser troll and unreportable
body:
A player named "Killerst" had only one summoner spell (flash and nothing) and fed intentionally for the entire duration of a game (if you load the chat log, was insanely profane and derogatory as well), while joking all game long that he couldn't be reported and he has a messed up account. After the game it booted us to the main screen without any ability to see match results, it was impossible to report him. He does not show up in the 'recently played' and has a completely empty match history on all 
profile websites and his profile despite playing this game. I have screen caps of the NA OP GG in game (which is now unavailable), the replay of the game in question, and several other screen shots.

https://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=killerst

replies.body: No worries, we did some investigating and noticed some strange stuff going on (only 1 summoner spell what the HECK?!). Thanks for giving us a heads up!
awesome thanks, it was easily the most unusual 'troll' I've ever encountered

Yeah I was in that game. Here's some screenshots I got because I was suspicious. 

https://image.prntscr.com/image/ESR8dliAQCWu6G6j2RBrjg.png
https://image.prntscr.com/image/te8zdHSXTUi0I_SWC2q81g.png
https://image.prntscr.com/image/K33Vij4IRTGbO0IAVE2Z-A.png
